get

public ScheduleTemplate[] get(ScheduleTemplate searchTemplate,
                              Employee caller)
                       throws DBException,
                              DBDownException
Gets all schedule templates in the database that match the given schedule template. Only one attribute from the given schedule template will be used for the search, in the following order:

A) Schedule Template ID (schedTempID)
B) Creator ID (creatorID)
C) Name (name)

Searches by name will be a fuzzy search, returning all schedules that include the contents of the search object, rather than an exact search.

Specified by:
get in class Broker<ScheduleTemplate>
Parameters:
searchTemplate - the schedule template holding the attribute to be used for the search.
caller - The employee currently logged into the system, used for permissions checks.
Throws:
DBException
DBDownException
See Also:
persistence.Broker#get(business.BusinessObject)

                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
Description copied from class: Broker
Parses a ResultSet returned by a select query back into cachable objects. The original search must have used a "SELECT *" so that full employee objects are in the ResultSet.

raceCheck

private boolean raceCheck(ScheduleTemplate old,
                          Employee caller)
                   throws DBChangeException,
                          DBException,
                          DBDownException
Compares a given schedule template against the database, ensuring that it has not been changed by another user. This is used check for race conditions when updating or deleting schedule templates in the database.

Parameters:
old - The schedule template that was previously retrieved from the database.
caller - The employee that is logged into the system.
Returns:
Throws:
DBChangeException
DBException
DBDownException

insertShiftTemplate

private void insertShiftTemplate(ShiftTemplate shiftTemp,
                                 int schedTempID,
                                 java.sql.PreparedStatement createShiftTemp,
                                 java.sql.PreparedStatement createShiftPos)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                 DBException
Inserts the given shift template, using the given connection, resultSet, and schedule ID.

Parameters:
shiftTemp - The shift template to insert into the database.
createShiftTemp - The resultSet defining the insert for a shift template.
createShiftPos - The resultSet defining the insert for a shift position.
schedTempID - The ID number of the schedule the shift belongs to
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - if there was an error with the insert statements.
DBException - if there was an error with executing the statements.

insertShiftPositions

private void insertShiftPositions(ShiftPosition[] shiftPosArr,
                                  int shiftTempID,
                                  java.sql.PreparedStatement createShiftPos)
                           throws DBException,
                                  java.sql.SQLException
Attempts to insert an array of shift positions into the database.

Parameters:
shiftPosArr - The array to insert.
shiftTempID - The shift template ID to use for all shift positions.
createShiftPos - The prepared statement used to execute the inserts.
Throws:
DBException
java.sql.SQLException
